original_definition: 'data collection and delivery process' means the process of collection of the set of data necessary in order to perform the frequency quality evaluation criteria;
generated_definition: 'data collection and delivery process' means the process of collecting and delivering data in a synchronous manner, appointed in accordance with article 133.
